Cloudflare DNS Conversion

1
horibu
Monday, August 28th, 2017, 9:27:15 PM

FYI, in an effort to better protect Elanthia Forums, we've moved our DNS provider over to Cloudflare and have enabled DNSSEC to hopefully prevent DNS cache poisoning. Please give it 24-78 hours to fully propagate across the global DNS system.

If you do happen to notice anything peculiar in regards to DNS or even SSL page loading, please post here and let us know. Thank you.
